metaData.label: Video Conference
metaData.criteriaDescription: ( Event Type equal ADM OR Event Type equal 3rd Party OR Event Type equal Physical OR Event Type equal Adobe OR Event Type equal ON24 OR Event Type equal WebEx OR Event Type equal Teams ) AND Event ID is not equal 22987 AND Event ID equal Event ID
